FDSYS.TITLE: Prohibition against conditioning a child's participation on collection of personal information.
FDSYS.HEADING: Section Â§ 312.7

ANCESTORS.PARENT: REGULATIONS UNDER SPECIFIC ACTS OF CONGRESS

SECTION.SUBJECT: Prohibition against conditioning a child's participation on collection of personal information.
SECTION.P: An operator is prohibited from conditioning a child's participation in a game, the offering of a prize, or another activity on the child's disclosing more personal information than is reasonably necessary to participate in such activity.
